Class LoginController

@Component public class LoginController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for Login page, implements Initializable, make it component

    • onClickLogin

      public void onClickLogin​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method is called when login button is pressed. If username or password field is empty, it shows an error message in snackbar. Otherwise, it makes a post request to API. If credentials are true, it navigated through the dashboard. Otherwise it shows an error message in snackbar.
      Parameters:
      event - ActionEvent
      Throws:
      IOException - for FXMLLoader

    • onClickLoginToRegister

      public void onClickLoginToRegister​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method is called when register hyperlink on login page is clicked. It loads register page.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - actionEvent
      Throws:
      IOException - IOException

    • onClickForgetPassword

      public void onClickForgetPassword​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method is called when forget password hyperlink on login page is clicked. It loads forget password page.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - actionEvent
      Throws:
      IOException - IOException
